content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Armen Sarkissian

in June 2018.]]
Below is a list of international presidential trips made by Armen Sarkissian as the 4th President of Armenia.
List
and Alexander Lukashenko at the closing ceremony of the 2019 European Games in Minsk.]]
{| class="wikitable sortable"
!Country!!City!!Dates!!Host!!Notes!!Type of Visit
|-
|  || Tbilisi || 25–26 May 2018 || President Giorgi Margvelashvili || He attended celebrations in honor of the 100th anniversary of Georgian Independence. He held a bilateral meeting with Giorgi Margvelashvili, Bidzina Ivanishvili and Finnish President Sauli Niinistö. || Working visit
|-
|  || London || 18–22 June 2018 || Marshal of the Diplomatic Corps Alistair Harrison || Held bilateral meetings at Buckingham Palace. || Working visit
|-
|  || Paris || 23–26 June 2018 || Secretary General Michaëlle Jean || Held meetings with French business representatives. Met with the Secretary General of the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie, Michaëlle Jean. || Working visit
|-
|  || Washington || 26–29 June 2018 || Secretary Mike Pompeo || Attended a reception in honor of the 100th anniversary of Armenian Independence. Participated in the Folklife Festival. || Working visit
|-
|  || Chamonix || 22–23 September 2018 || Unknown || Participated in the Summit of Mind.|| Working visit
|-
|  || New York City || 3–5 October || Unknown || Met with Henry Kissinger.|| Working visit
|-
|  || Paris || 5 October 2018 || President Emmanuel Macron || Attended the funeral of Charles Aznavour.|| Working visit
|-
|  || Geneva || 23–25 October 2018 || President Alain Berset || Participated at the official opening of the World Investment Forum.|| Working visit
|-
|  || Minsk || 29 October - 1 November 2018 || President Alexander Lukashenko || Met with the Main Group of the Munich Security Conference. || Working visit
|-
|  || Paris || 12–13 September 2018 || Unknown || Met with the Managing Partner of the annual Summit of Minds in Chamonix.|| Working visit
|-
|  || Rome || 14–17 November 2018 || President Sergio Mattarella || Discussed issues related to the strengthening of the Armenian-Italian relations with President Mattarella.|| Working visit
|-
|  || Berlin || 27–30 November 2018 || President Frank-Walter Steinmeier ||  || State visit
|-
|  || Telavi, Tbilisi || 16 December 2018 || President Salome Zurabishvili || He attended the inauguration of Salome Zurabishvili.|| Working visit
|-
|  || Abu Dhabi || 14 January 2019 || Crown Prince Mohammed bin Zayed al-Nahyan || Participated in the Abu Dhabi Sustainable Week International Forum. || Official visit
|-
| || Paris || 6–9 February 2019 || Christian Nardin || Met with French entrepreneurs. Attended a session of the Armenian General Benevolent Union. || Working Visit
|-
| || Munich || 18 February 2019 || Chancellor Angela Merkel || Attended the Munich Security Conference. Visited Munich Technical University. || Working Visit
|-
| || Amman || 5–7 April 2019 || King Abdullah II bin Al-Hussein || Attended the World Economic Forum. || Working Visit
|-
| || Lisbon || 7–9 April 2019 || President Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa ||  || Working Visit
|-
| || Nur-Sultan || 17 May 2019 || President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev ||  || Working Visit
|-
|  || Geneva || 27 June 2019 || President Ueli Maurer || Participated in the Crans Montana Forum.|| Working visit
|-
|  || Minsk || 30 June || President Alexander Lukashenko || Attended the closing ceremony of the 2019 European Games. || Working visit
|-
|  || Paris || 24 July 2019 || Unknown ||  || Working visit
|-
